DOC.criteria: Adults males/Females age 20years Health screen examination within 60 day start ( Interview , vital sign , 12lead ECG , blood test , urinalysis ) . The applicant agree write told explanation enough characteristic study drug , purpose test detail . Subjects clinically significant disease history Liver , kidney , gastrointestinal , respiratory , musculoskeletal , endocrine , nervous psychiatric , blood tumor system cardiovascular . ( In particular , bronchial asthma , severe hepatic , renal failure , severe blood disorder , severe myasthenia gravis , cardiac dysfunction , peptic ulcer , etc . ) Who acute disease organ dysfunction within four week start test . Who significant hematologic disorder donate whole blood within two month start test . Significant neuropsychiatric . Continued drug abuse . Who history drug hypersensitivity reaction . Positive Type B / C hepatitis , syphilis test ( VDRL ) , AIDS antibody test Who take clinical medicine within two month start test . Who smoke drink within two week dose . Who take drug regularly mineral claim vitamin . However , depend judgment researcher .
